text: Julian Wyatt Glover (born 27 March 1935) is an English actor. He is known for his roles as General Maximilian Veers in The Empire Strikes Back, Aristotle Kristatos in the James Bond movie For Your Eyes Only, Walter Donovan in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, Brian Harcourt-Smith in The Fourth Protocol, and Grand Maester Pycelle in Game of Thrones. He also voiced the giant spider Aragog in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Actors who played Bond villains
title: Julian Glover
